Home / Local Networks / Local Networks Report on Activities

Local Networks Report on Activities

As agreed at the  II Annual Local Networks Forum in London on November 2004, each network is expected to prepare an annual report, describing activities and initiatives undertaken in the previous year. On this page you can read these reports and learn about the specific activities of local networks around the world.
